website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality headset that works well for long gaming sessions. The crisp audio allows you to hear footsteps easily.
pros: Great audio quality whether you're gaming, watching a movie, or chatting with friends
Sturdy build and comfortable ear cups
Designed to work well with Discord
cons: A few customers experienced mic feedback

customer_reviews.title: Great audio, but comfort is a slight issue
customer_reviews.text: Bought this headset a few days ago and it has amazing sound and the ear cups are very comfy, but like a lot of people my ears press against the drivers inside, making them uncomfortable after a while. I contacted Hyperx directly about this issue with the cups and they said they have revised the design of the ear cups for this headset and said they will send me some free of charge. So if you do get this headset and experience some issues with comfort, don’t worry, go to the hyperx websites customer service and ask about the new ear cups (they will be available at the end of the month 30/4/18 ish). Hope this helps people:)
customer_reviews.author: AshTag

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: This product is all about quality,... high quality frame, soft earcups, braided cable, in-line controls, detachable cable and mic, the stitching,... when you hold them in your hand you can feel the effort that was put in every detail that makes it such a nice headset. They sound great and are very comfortable during long gaming periods. The only thing it failed to deliver is to improve my gaming,... I still suck at aiming :). I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Saša

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding, best headphones ever!
customer_reviews.text: Got fed up having to buy headphones that worked ok but the wire or the connection or the mic had broken. No way of fixing them. Then noticed these on Amazon. These have cables and a mic that detach, so if the cable frays (although the cable does seem a lot better made than the plastic coated ones I’ve had in the past) or breaks you can replace it. Also very, very comfortable to wear (contrary to other reviews) they ooze quality and deliver superb, rich sound. Perfect for Call of Duty. More expensive than I’d normally pay, but hopefully they should last a lot longer, and if the wire breaks, spares are available for around £15. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: The detachable cable makes this a better choice over the Cloud X for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gaming headset for Xbox. It's very comfy and made well. I'm writing this review several months after buying 3 of these for my son's and I. They are as good as new still. The sound and mic quality are excellent. I'd recommend this over the Cloud X because of the detachable cable. My son damaged the jack on his last headset and that was that! With this any damage to the jack would just mean a new cable - so although slightly more expensive, the Cloud Alpha could be cheaper in the long run. Both the gold and red versions look great. Highly recommended for a great gaming experience!
customer_reviews.author: Gareth Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great headset if all you play is single player
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my PS4 and Mixamp pro. The sound is excellent and directional audio is superb. When I'm playing single player I can't fault the audio quality. The reason I can only give this 3 stars is because of the mic. It intermittently cuts out and is extremely frustrating for my teammates in multiplayer games. Not really what you expect when it costs around £80. It was like this from new, and I haven't found a workaround. There's no sound card with this, so as far as I know, no way to update drivers. very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Darth Sandhog

customer_reviews.title: Sound not great, microphone is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with these headphones. The sound is below average. The biggest issue is the microphone, it is lousy. I have adjusted settings multiple times and cannot get the mic to work adequately. If I speak normally, the mic rarely picks up anything. If I raise my voice, it still sounds soft. Waste of £90!
customer_reviews.author: Tazout

customer_reviews.title: Solid build, but microphone let me down
customer_reviews.text: Amazing audio quality for listening. Comfortable to wear for a few hours. Microphone has been the main issue. I ended up returning this item. The microphone would be inconsistent. Too loud, or too quiet. Friends would constantly complain about it. I hadn't even changed any settings either. Was different every day and was such a headache trying to adjust it before gaming. Might have been a a dodgy headset, but put me right off and bought a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: TheHonestBloke

customer_reviews.title: great gaming headphones
customer_reviews.text: i've always used hyper x for all of my gaming headphones my these are a step up from the last generation hyper x headphones. they have deep lows and crystal clear highs. the mic while not the best is more than adequate for most peoples needs. also has a surprising amount of bass while not being distorted which is rare on gaming headphones. fully recommend to anyone with this budget in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Nirvan

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Almost Flawless. I can’t hear people coming into the house, which is phenomenal for non powered noise cancellation. Sound quality it top notch, comfortable once broken in a little. Only minor downside is I get minor drop outs. People have mentioned my mic dropping out occasionally and I’ve noticed my sound dropping. I put this down to the blutooth connection from my series 1 PS4 controller. It’ll cost me around £40 to eliminate the drop out.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: perfect headset
customer_reviews.text: the best headset from everything i tried..it has the best sound even from more expensive headsets that i tried...i think for the range 50-150 pounds its the second best headset behind the hyper x cloud aplha because they have better bass. so hyper x cloud 2 more clean sound hyper cloud alpha better bass dont buy the alpha s even if they say its the same drivers the alpha sounds better overal.
customer_reviews.author: Billakos

customer_reviews.title: Decent mic, good sound, good comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. I had the HyperX cloud 1 before these, but they started to really get worn (one side always 50% weaker than the other). Oh well, 4 years of daily use what can I expect. The mic on these is quite good but ofc nothing like a standing mic. Sound is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Summit

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality in this product is fairly good, a little bit base heavy though, when it actually works. Comfort is average at best. I have constant issues with the connections, whilst gaming, every half hour or so I have to disconnect the headset and wipe the connection (middle jack). Because the only sound that is coming through has loads of static. I would not recommend this headset, I will not be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Sound
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are of good quality. They fit well and are comfortable to wear a length of time while gaming. The only issue I have is the material used on the ear cups and head band tends to make you sweat at point of contact. this issue seems to be with all headphones as they all use this type of material. I am happy with my purchase and would definitely recommend at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Shaqille

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, pity the mic is intermittent
customer_reviews.text: So got this head set as I wanted to upgrade. After a few online games people started saying that I cut in and out, thought it was my controller battery, however after a while the issue got substantially worse, just after my return option expired. Hopefully the manufacturer can replace the item otherwise I’m out of pocket a pretty penny. Maybe look for a head set for gaming without a detachable mic??
customer_reviews.author: Jonny C.

customer_reviews.text: Hello. I buy this headset about 4 mounts ago and i was really happy with this buy but.. i think my right speaker its broken.. when i play any game or i listen music i heard some strange noise.. dunno how to discribe.. ‘its like a mosquito’ on my right speaker and its really annoying cuz i play fps games and there the sound its really important.. any help what can i do now? I read o the coments i have warranty for 2 years.. what is the procedure or what i need to do? Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Belko Andor

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, but needed a replacement cable.
customer_reviews.text: I like the headset and it produces a good sound, although the finish doesn't feel as high quality as the more-expensive Turtle Beach headset I owned before (on which the headband snapped, due to poor design). The main issue I'm writing this review to mention though as the headset needed a replacement cable after four months, as a fault with the inline volume controls caused the left speaker to turn off when set to - or near - max volume.
customer_reviews.author: Mercurian

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever used, everything sounds big and loud without distortion. I had to tweak some equalisation on pc for extra bass, but it handles deeper bass so well I wonder why I doesn't sound like that out the box. Default settings on PS4 are good too though. Build quality 5/5 Comfort 5/5 Mic 5/5 Sound 5/5 Value 5/5 I bought these on sale for 69.99 and they sound like they're worth 200
customer_reviews.author: Mvelo

customer_reviews.title: Brillant Cans
customer_reviews.text: Look I am not a music expert so I can only comment on how they sound to me and I think there great Also these are without doubt the most comfy headphone I have used. The memory foam does make a difference. I play games using them 90% of the time and for hours on end with no problems. Keep your eye out for deals on these as they go up and down, I caught them on a low price and was very happy. The cable length is good and there is an extender which I can use for movies when the wife is in bed which is long enough to reach across the room from the tv amp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones, works as expected. Can get uncomfortable after long useage.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are great, the microphone is clear and the sound quality is what you would expect at this price. The only issue is that the wire can get tangled pretty bad and the ear cussioning can start to cause some discomfort after long useage. Maybe it is just a sign that I need to take a break, haha.
customer_reviews.author: K1NG_01

customer_reviews.title: Well made, comfortable and sound great.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a set of the Steel series arctis 7's with these, don't regret it all. The cable is really long and flexible, the earcups have supremely comfortable padding and the head band has a loads of adjustment in it. The sound quality is really good. The bass is nice and rich and the general sound stage is well judged for a gaming headset. My only gripe would be that I wish the volume/mute controls were on the ear cups rather than on a inline remote.
customer_reviews.author: fillip2k

customer_reviews.title: Microphone is too quiet
customer_reviews.text: I had the HyperX Cloud II before this and the microphone was fine. Unfortunately it broke so I upgraded to this and now people are complaining about my microphone being too quiet even though I have it at max.
customer_reviews.author: PokerMaster

customer_reviews.title: if it isnt working
customer_reviews.text: Really good headset lets you hear everything clearly, especially good for games like pubg, fortnite, R6S, and other games where hearing footsteps is vital, one thing that i did come across though was my PC recognized it but the mic wouldn't work . After hours of searching on youtube videos and nothing working. I turned my PC off, plugged the 2 jacks in and connected everything turned my PC back on, went into discord for the billionth time checked to see if it worked and nothing, I then did the good ole unplugging the wires on the actual headset and plugged them back in and everything worked!!
customer_reviews.author: Ranvir

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic (after some messing about)
customer_reviews.text: I find the headset very confortable, I have no problems wearing them for 8 hours a day (with a break every couple of hours). The microphone quality was poor at first, but then I realised that was because I was plugging straight into the motherboard via the headphone/microphone ports on the back of my PC. I bought a cheap USB sound card and the difference is night and day, crystal clear mic quality with no noise. As long as you can avoid plugging directly into the PC, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Wicker

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this if you don't have a sound card
customer_reviews.text: I kept my eye on this headset for a while and made the mistake of buying it before doing proper research. Being used to USB headsets for my PC, I had forgotten that AUX headsets pick up on all the static interference generated by the computer's motherboard. I would suggets buying this for a computer only if you have a separated/external sound card, as not having one will result in MUCH lower audio quality and simply grating whistling/static noise in your microphone's recordings. I would suggest buying the HyperX Cloud 2 model instead, which has a USB box.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: If you're having problems with the mic, it needs pushing in further!! With that said, great headphones. Doesn't pick up my sniffing/scratching like Cloud 2s did. Replaceable cable and mic, with inline volume contol/mute. Only complaint is a weird sound when no signal pkaying, sounds like quiet rain.
customer_reviews.author: skankhunt42

customer_reviews.title: very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Heard some people complain about how heavy they are; however I've had no issues with the ear pads and think they're super comfy and actually the extra weight makes them more enclosed on my ears. Sound quality is amazing especially the bass and surround sound. The metal frame of the headphones are great quality and really make these stand out from other brands. The mic is absolutely amazing for the price compared to other headset mic's I've tried before. love them :P
customer_reviews.author: Bradley White

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Ok So I Can’t hear a thing when wearing so that’s great, volume is 8/10 I would say, comfortable as hell!!!! Could wear them all night, sturdy is a defo, they look sexy as anything to and delivery great to good product all in all tbh
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming headset for value!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for gaming and light music use! I'm in love with these headphones, I bought this to replace my Turtlebeach Xofours and I couldn't be happier, the song quality is amazing! I'm half deaf yet I can hear so much around me with ease! The only drawback in my opinion is the two wires that stick out just above the ears, it makes me a tad worried that they could easily break.
customer_reviews.author: Trey R.

customer_reviews.title: These are good but CloudX sounded better on Xbox to me.
customer_reviews.text: I tried these out today and felt that instantly I could hear the CloudX headset which is a lot cheaper was better in terms of sound and comfort for me. Obviously sound and comfort is a personal thing but these are not any sort of improvement for me so not worth the extra cost. These are still very good but for me anyway, the cloudx offer better value for money. Both of these were tested using Dolby Atmos on the Xbox One X.
customer_reviews.author: Transurfer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: This headset just like many other hyper x products is pure quality , get it for the price and it's worth every penny the sound quality is pretty good though it isnt the top. As for comfort for a large head like mine it just about was perfect at maximum extension . Switching from my old logitech g43, it definitely felt much better quality and is perfect for both casual use and gaming. Comparing it to my friends cloud II I can definitely say this looks nicer and feels nicer but apart from that they pretty much are equal.
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Good overall quality, for sound and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these headphones for a few months now, and from what I can tell they are a great quality pair of headphones. Especially with some high quality music they sound really good. The microphone being detachable is great and have had no problems with it ever. They stay on my head well and are comfortable for a reasonable time. Also noticed that people around you don't seem to hear what you are listening to unless you're on high volume which is nice. Overall great pair of headphones. Only problem I did seem to have was some rattling at different frequencies occasionally but it was so rare it doesn't bother me at all!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing can't recommend less
customer_reviews.text: Best for bass. Amazing sound for movies and TV shows. Great build quality. Solid mic performance nice comfort. Great ear pads. Detachable cable is a huge plus. Recommended for people who love to do everything with one set.
customer_reviews.author: Alee

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend for people with glasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after my last headset broke. I wear glasses so comfort was a must and these came recommended. For the first 30 mins they are fine but after that they start to push the frame of my glasses into the side of my head causing a lot of discomfort and pain. Also apparently a "common issue" is a defective mic. When I was in party chat with my friends there was a constant echo coming from my headset. I tried everything to fix this problem but it's hopeless so I ended up returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Callum

customer_reviews.title: nice headset, one problem I've found
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice headset, the only problem I have is that when I'm talking to people in games / discord etc, the microphone picks up static which only the other party can hear, it's quite annoying, if I could fix this then it would be 100% 5 star rating, if anyone has any ideas, let me know, or I fear I may have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Common echo issues with no clear fix. Good mic quality.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to game with friends then I'd go elsewhere unless you want to risk an extremely sensitive echo. 3+ hours of trying various fixes on forums led no where. Extremely frustrating. A quick Google search reveals how common this issue is on Ps4, Pc and Xbox Whilst that rules out the headset for gaming I must say the audio quality is incredible for its price point and mic quality is not too bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Build quality better mediocre sound
customer_reviews.text: I’m not impressed with sound on my PS4 not tried on pc. at this the price expected more, build quality very very good one of best I seen The padding could have been deeper My ear touch’s the hard plastic inside the cans after a long session but that could be me, but I haven’t got this problem with others
customer_reviews.author: domp67

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Headset!
customer_reviews.text: This headset is really nice. It is stereo and not surround sound so perfect for the games I play. CSGO for example is really good with this headset I can hear everyone on the map very easily. The sound quality is also great. This is by far the best headset I have ever owned and I have had many expensive headsets that cost £150+. This one is very cheat and defiantly worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Comfort is next level with these. I have a pretty big head and big ears, but they fit right over my ears perfectly and are just about big enough to fit on my head. Sound quality is very good and I need to take them off in order to hear if someone is talking to me, so noise cancellation is amazing. The wires feel very durable and the splitter can be easily connect to an adapter for use with PC's.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy tacky and faulty
customer_reviews.text: Absolute joke, I received the headset expecting a quality product and all I got was a pile of crap, the quality is low and the headset is very tacky and also came broken as I could not speak on Xbox , never buying again and I would also say that to anyone else as I had a pair befor that only lasted under two months before becoming faulty
customer_reviews.author: Reiss jones

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: Purchased many different gaming and studio headsets in order to find the right one, but I must say these are perfect. Not too expensive, the best sound drivers available, and despite some comments, definitely the comfiest headset I have used. Perfect for hard core gamers such as myself, pc and console. Had studio headphones with amplifiers, etc, and nothing was as good or as comfortable as these, won't find any better gaming headphones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander S.

customer_reviews.title: Really good quilty sound
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Very comphy on the ears. Sound quality is amazing. Iv brought two pairs now. Compered to other headphones iv used in the past these are the best. Really good value
customer_reviews.author: Mr G.

customer_reviews.title: Great 2.0 headset
customer_reviews.text: Comfort is subject but they are comfortable for me and sound great on my DAC, I use them for gaming and have had no issue with them, just wish they came with more colour options
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome and build quality is 10/10, however, sound and comfort is sub-par.
customer_reviews.text: Really suprised, the most uncomfortable gaming headset I've ever worn, the ears are pressed into your skull. Sound is average, very bass heavy. Mic is average.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Harper

customer_reviews.title: Sound very poor, your own voice through speakers
customer_reviews.text: They completely cut off outside noise and like suction to your head like ear defenders and then your voice in the mic is also in the earpiece along with all the other noises. A horrible mess of sound. Can't adjust talking and game noise separately. My cheap px11 turtle beach blows them out of the water in every way. Very disappointed as they have some good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: leslie carson

customer_reviews.title: Best head set yet
customer_reviews.text: Hyper never fail to dissapointed with headsets. I've had the cloud and cloud pros before this but the alphas are the best yet! So comfortable, great sound quality and really durable. Ive been gaming for the past 18 years and used numerous headset makes (including tutlebeach, steel series, logitech, afterglow, razer and astro) whilst they all served the purpose and did what was needed, hyper headsets just seem to be a different class. 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality and makes me feel like a rich kid.
customer_reviews.text: Both its form and functionality are top of the line. Before owning this headset, i've been using earbuds and extremely cheap headsets, mostly due to being a student with little funds. It arrived packaged in a fancy box which made the act of just opening it, pretty exciting. The cables it comes with are very durable and i doubt they will break anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Bean-Reader

customer_reviews.title: One of the best in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: This is the best headset I have ever used. The sound is extremely clear and accurate, very neat and presentable design, comfortable pads. They stay perfectly on your head, no matter how much you shake it, they will not slide or move a bit. Excellent job, this is definitely worth the money, especially for people who play Counter Strike or other competitive FPS games that require the use of detailed sound. Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: weronika_db

customer_reviews.title: 20/10 love this brand customer for life
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand awesome headphones for a awesome pice last headphones broke after 5-6 years after heavy use you got your self a customer for life
customer_reviews.author: goodman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed sound quality
customer_reviews.text: After reading lost of reviews I expected more, much more. Sound quality is mediocre at best (tested on sound blaster external sound card with DAC and on-board sound card). Micro is below avarage. Good build quality and very comfy. I regret I picked this on over Logitech G Pro X.
customer_reviews.author: Marcin Majewski

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great headset. Is headset replaced my Logitech g433 because of a snapped headband and I was very surprised when I received the alpha. In my opinion the base is richer than the g433 and the build quality is a lot better with a very solid and comfortable headband and metal connecting the headband to the earphones
customer_reviews.author: Seb

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: They were ok in loudness but the definition on then sucked could not hear where approaching gun fire or foot steps were coming from I've since moved onto the steel series artics pro wireless headset and they by far are the best headset I've ever used, people say they are uncomfortable but I disagree the fact it has two batteries to use is so convenient. The sound is superb and can pin point any directional sound you definitely get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality but terrible mic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product recently and the sound quality was high and the headset was comfortable. My only complaints about the headset is that the microphone is terrible and it randomly paused my music at random points every 5 minutes or so. The microphone sound is very tinny and muffled which makes it hard for people to understand what I was saying. I plan on returning this item and purchasing a different headset with a good sounding microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a reduced price when they were first released. These headphones have been the best I've ever had, durable, good quality audio and mic works well and has not failed me. The braided cable also helps.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the job
customer_reviews.text: my son wanted these for gaming and he is very pleased with them as good fit and do not rub on top of head So good buy and worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J Wallace

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: over time might feel heavy but it's certainly comfortable and the sound quality is nice. use it for overwatch gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Nur Adlina Haji Azman

customer_reviews.title: Good headset but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: The sound that you can here through the headset is spot of for hearing foot steps in game for getting that good game play, the only two thing that is not so great about this head set is the microphone in party chat is not great it sounds a bit tiney to the other people in the chat, and the second being that headset cable it's just a little two long and gets in the way when sitting at a desk having a gaming session.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan j.

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good, lacking a little bit of bass for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good, lacking a little bit of bass for my liking, but you can fix that by using an equalizer on player like Aimp. Build quality is superb, really quality headphones, they look expensive and nice. Mic is very good, clear, but gotta have it close to ur mouth, otherwise you sound kinda quiet but that is not a big issue. The biggest thing i hate is the comfort, the pads are very good but something about this headset that can't make me use it for long periods of time...... got it on sale, so not complaining, good headset overall!
customer_reviews.author: Rolandas

customer_reviews.title: Good first headset
customer_reviews.text: I use the headset on the PS4. its a good headset for your first one, its comfortable sounds good cons: you can only pug it into the headphone jack on the controller. unable to decrees party or game volume interdependently for example you need to hear the game over your friends but the the other way. had to buy the adaptor to be able to pug it into the usb .
customer_reviews.author: samuel underwood

customer_reviews.title: Love them despite problems initially
customer_reviews.text: Great headset, loving them even given initial teething problems. I'm not an audiophile but for games they sound great and for me the mic is good (not really to comment on this). Very comfy Great sound (for games) Sturdy (as far as I can tell) I found them a bit tight at first but given a few hours of wear and the correct size, very comfy. I had a dodgy headset (more the cable leading in) but both hyperx and amazon were very good in dealing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pyrrhic

customer_reviews.title: excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Overall very good performance, sound is good and very deep. The cans are very well insulated and cut out allot of the ambient sound. but can get a little uncomfortable and sweaty when wearing for long periods. One downside is that the sound has such a nice range that sometimes i think someone is in the room and get scared.
customer_reviews.author: J-Tao

customer_reviews.title: Very good headset for the money
customer_reviews.text: This headset is really good for people that don't know much about he audio side of things. The headset is a very comfortable and has great sound quality. If you are looking for a great headset for the price this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Darwell

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality headset for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for 9 months now, use them almost everyday and I'm very pleased, great all round sound. Mic also works really well. Quality feel and built throughout, very comfortable. I use on my xbox1, if you're getting an echo in the party chat make sure all of your controllers assigned to your Xbox are up to date.
customer_reviews.author: Davo McNacho

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are brilliant. Really comfortable and great design. Everything about them from the lead to the sound is great. Stunning product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My gaming son tells me these are "sick", far better than the Logitek G432 they replaced. Brilliant sound/features for the price. When new they were tight and uncomfortable (my son has a normal sized head before anyone asks!), so I placed them on a football over night to stretch them out, worked like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: JStew

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: pros: comfortable detachable cables and mic for use on the go comes with a nice carrying bag cons: mic picks up desktop audio (very subtle, but it's there... might be picking it up from my headset? not sure) highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Suhail

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: So far I am really enjoying the HyperX Cloud Alpha headset. The sound quality is great, as is the comfort, and the mic is nice and clear with minimal background noise. More comfortable than my old Turtle Beach OX Seven headset, which pressed my glasses against my head; but I have had no such problem with the Cloud Alpha.
customer_reviews.author: Alex C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Hey all, like to share my review about this headphones and what can i say is that they are amazing, great sound, very comfy, absolutely amazing, very good for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: TearDropBv

customer_reviews.title: Quality purchase..
customer_reviews.text: Simply a excellent headset.. Very comfortable, ear cups are great..
customer_reviews.author: muzrik

customer_reviews.title: HyperX perfection, again!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality isn't audiophile tier, but this is a jack of all trades headset that is an amazing all rounder for anyone into social gaming!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great if they fit
customer_reviews.text: Great headset if they FIT, also I read that to make them comfy to purchase some different ear pads, but the clamping was too strange on my sweed
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: A premium headset for less than £100.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a handful of gaming headsets over the years and these take the crown. - Comfortable - Clear audio - Clear microphone Everything you need in a gaming headset without spending a small fortune. They also have a feel of a headset that would cost a lot more than priced. Look no further for a budget set of headphones for mid/high level gaming. These are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancellation is top notch. Sound quality: sounds a bit more muffled than my HyperX Cloud II, though that might be because I've grown accustomed to it, so I'll have to keep using the Cloud to see. Very comfortable to wear. Favourite part is the 100% detachable cable. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Klumz

customer_reviews.title: Best quality price headset
customer_reviews.text: Got this headset for my boyfriend as a birthday present since he is a big C9 fan. I had been using the cloud alpha headphones in red for more than a year prior to this purchase. It's amazing, definitely one of the best headsets quality price wise. I love it, my boyfriend loved it. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ruxandra

customer_reviews.title: A Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift to replace an old worn out Turtle Bay headset on both Xbox and PC. The difference in sound quality is night and day - if you're looking for a great quality gaming headset this Christmas for any gamer friends or family you can't go wrong with this! Don't forget to adjust settings especially on Xbox to get the most out of this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Good but no L jack
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is ok, microphone is good. No idea why the headphone jack is not an L jack though because already I get regular cutouts.
customer_reviews.author: Aron

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Great mic, comfortable ear cushions and headband. Sound may be a bit bassy for some people, music and games sound great. For headphones without specific noise cancellation features, they a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: A streamers dream headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones for streaming, music and chat, a must have. Also get the 7.1 dongle for full virtual surround.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work on my pc without an external soundcard.
customer_reviews.text: This headset will not work on my computer at all without some form of soundcard. I have to buy a hyperx sound card now because it simply wont work. I'm not sure why, it works on laptops and even another computer i own but for some reason i cannot get it to work. Bass is amazing when you get it to work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Well rounded and extremely comfortable headset, you can barely feel like its on your head. Base is great, only not so great thing is that its not over the top loud which i guess is good. The wire is extremely long if you use the extended cable. All in all great headset thats also very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Azuolas

customer_reviews.title: Buy New
customer_reviews.text: Can only give a poor review as it was purchased at the same time as a mouse with the warehouse deals, both items were sold as slight damage to the box, both items were faulty. Obviously both items had been returned as faulty and were not checked and then resold. Buy new!!
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY JAMES

customer_reviews.title: Gaming head set
customer_reviews.text: Nice birthday present for gamers. My Son loves them and they seem durable, as they are used daily.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Doohan

customer_reviews.title: Wow !
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sister for an xmas present and she loves them ! Only thing I would say is to make sure the mic is pushed in properly otherwise it won’t work ! Absolutely over the moon with these they are the perfect gift for a regular headphone user
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is great, mic quality is good for a gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great, mic quality is good for a gaming headset. The only thing I dislike is the cups press against my ears a little too hard and you'll notice it after a long session.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great budget headphones
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable with a nice appearance, detachable mic and great sound quality. what's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is second to none
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I've had in several years. The first pair was borrowed by my husband. I use mine for PS4 and would highly recommend them. These are the first headphones in 15 years that I have NOT had to replace after the first year.
customer_reviews.author: funkymotha

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality, very well packaged!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely comfortable headphones with great sound.I did did the volume was limited so I paired mine with an external dac amp (gsx1200 pro) and they literally blow your head off whilst gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Vern

customer_reviews.title: Measly sound quality, awful microphone.
customer_reviews.text: For £80 I expected a lot more out of these. Light weight, pretty comfortable and good noise cancelling. Otherwise audio quality is sub-par and the microphone barely works. The ear cups get sweaty pretty quickly, too. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sherborne

customer_reviews.title: Impressed so far
customer_reviews.text: My son is impressed with this item he bought these as his friend recommended them and he happy with them so far
customer_reviews.author: paul.32uk

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Everything is perfect except that it got uncomfortable after prolonged use. The ear cups don't tilt very much
customer_reviews.author: SomeRandomDude

customer_reviews.title: Good quality build and brand, comfort and good sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and great sound quality, dont like the expose wires coming from the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, easy to wear on long term, mic is also good.
customer_reviews.author: Vlatko

customer_reviews.title: Microphone doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Headphones work but mic does not. Needs an adaptor to work with Xbox elite controllers which it does not specify. Have not managed to get the Mic to work on my pc yet either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible heaphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones might be the best budget headphones for their price. Amazing sound quality, durable and very comfortable for 4-8 hours of constantly gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding headphones, good adjustability and comfortable for long gaming sessions.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing negative to say about these headphones. They sound great while gaming and they're also good for listening to music and for watching movies. I also like that the cord is replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: MISS D.

customer_reviews.title: High quality audio input and output
customer_reviews.text: High quality audio, good quality mic (for a headset). Functionality of removable mic and cable is excellent. Keep your braided cables straight (unplug them when not in use) so that they don't tangle and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product was not comfortable at all, was digging into my cheeks so decided to return it and get a new one. Over a month later still no sign of a refund or contact about one.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful hyper technical support
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headset however, my system sound was leaking through the microphone for unknown reasons and the hyperx technical support was hopelessly slow. So slow in fact, I sent this back to amazon for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Kieran

customer_reviews.title: Overall4
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great very loud and clear, can easily hear people moving around you but at times it can be a bit too loud making you think someone is right next to you when in fact they’re not. Other than that a great headset.
customer_reviews.author: Yung Strxy

customer_reviews.title: Best in price range
customer_reviews.text: Was looking at headphones within the £100 price range and this was by far the best headset I could find. The mic is great, the sound quality is amazing and it is incredibly comfortable no matter what anybody else says.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Peck

customer_reviews.title: Audio AMAZING. Mic Quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Audio is CLEAN, the headset is comfortable and the mic sounds great. But the mic is also VERY quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ireland

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,033 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
